chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
n: nat
m: nat
u2: nat -> nat -> T
u1: nat -> nat -> T

Goal:
(forall i j : nat, (i < m)%nat -> (j < n)%nat -> u1 i j = u2 i j) <-> mk_matrix m n u1 = mk_matrix m n u2

Premises:
mk_matrix : forall m n : nat, (nat -> nat -> T) -> matrix m n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
coeff_mat_ext_aux : forall (x1 x2 : T) (v1 v2 : matrix ?m ?n), v1 = v2 < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < ?m)%nat -> (j < ?n)%nat -> coeff_mat x1 v1 i j = coeff_mat x2 v2 i j) where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
coeff_mat_ext : forall (x0 : T) (v1 v2 : matrix ?m ?n), v1 = v2 < -> (forall i j : nat, coeff_mat x0 v1 i j = coeff_mat x0 v2 i j) where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
coeff_mat_bij : forall (x0 : T) (u : nat -> nat -> T) (i j : nat), (i < ?m)%nat -> (j < ?n)%nat -> coeff_mat x0 (mk_matrix ?m ?n u) i j = u i j where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
List.NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> (j < length l)%nat -> List.nth i l d = List.nth j l d -> i = j)
List.NoDup_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> List.nth_error l i = List.nth_error l j -> i = j)
coeff_Tn_ext : forall (x1 x2 : ?T) (v1 v2 : Tn ?n ?T), v1 = v2 < -> (forall i : nat, (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x1 v1 i = coeff_Tn x2 v2 i) where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
RList_P6 : forall l : Rlist, ordered_Rlist l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i <= j)%nat -> (j < Rlength l)%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l j)
mk_Tn_ext : forall (n0 : nat) (u3 u4 : nat -> ?T), (forall i : nat, (i < n0)%nat -> u3 i = u4 i) < -> mk_Tn n0 u3 = mk_Tn n0 u4 where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- Type]
coeff_Tn_bij : forall (x0 : ?T) (u : nat -> ?T) (i : nat), (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x0 (mk_Tn ?n u) i = u i where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
mk_matrix_bij : forall (x0 : T) (A : matrix ?m ?n), mk_matrix ?m ?n (coeff_mat x0 A) = A where ?m : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
mk_Tn_bij : forall (x0 : ?T) (v : Tn ?n ?T), mk_Tn ?n (coeff_Tn x0 v) = v where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- nat]
mk_Tn : forall n0 : nat, (nat -> ?T) -> Tn n0 ?T where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat u1 : nat -> nat -> T u2 : nat -> nat -> T |- Type]
coeff_mat = fun (m n : nat) (x0 : T) (A : matrix m n) (i j : nat) => coeff_Tn x0 (coeff_Tn (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => x0)) A i) j : forall m n : nat, T -> matrix m n -> nat -> nat -> T Arguments m, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope _ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.min_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.min n m
Nat.max_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = m \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.max n m
adapted_couple_opt = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => adapted_couple f a b l lf /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength lf))%nat -> pos_Rl lf i <> pos_Rl lf (S i) \/ f (pos_Rl l (S i)) <> pos_Rl lf i) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> pos_Rl l i <> pos_Rl l (S i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
ordered_Rlist = fun l : Rlist => forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l (S i) : Rlist -> Prop
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, (z <= n)%nat -> (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < n)%nat -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < n)%nat -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < S n)%nat -> A m)
Nat.order_induction_0 : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, (0 <= n)%nat -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, (n < 0)%nat -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
gt = fun n m : nat => (m < n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.lt_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A (S n) -> (forall m : nat, (n < m)%nat -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, (n < m)%nat -> A m
lt = fun n m : nat => (S n <= m)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
ge = fun n m : nat => (m <= n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0%nat -> (p * n)%nat = (p * m)%nat < -> n = m
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
matrix = fun m n : nat => Tn m (Tn n T) : nat -> nat -> Type Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
Nat.max_unicity : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ p = m \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ p = n -> p = Nat.max n m
Nat.min_unicity : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ p = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ p = m -> p = Nat.min n m
